--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Peter A Bleed" <pbleed1@u...> 

> John Lissenden wrote a very interesting MA thesis on this school at 
>the University of Durham, last year. I am sure that he will try to 
>see it published, but that has not happened yet. Beyond that there is 
>a lot of other discussion of these issues whenever the Namban 
>category is described.


Perhaps you could obtain a copy via "Disertation Abstracts".
They seem to be able to furnish most any masters or doctorial
level work. I got two from them a couple years ago pertaining
to Japanese swords. There is of course charges involved for
copying and shipping.

Rich S
